name: The Entrepreneur
description:
A young man leaves his college and friends to fulfill his deceased father's dream, to renovate and open the bar he dedicated his life to and therefore, become an Entrepreneur. As he goes back to the city where he was made to the man he is now, he will end up living with three women on which he'll have a major impact. How will he react when facing important choices and what impact on their future will it have ? It is all in your hands.



ENDEARING CHARACTERS
The Entrepreneur is an Adult Visual Novel in which you will encounter many girls, each with their own personality and storyline. Makes friends, lovers, even enemies as you progress in the adventure of a young man opening his business. In The Entrepreneur you will be presented with an immersive gameplay as every choices you will make will impact the story, and lead you down different paths. And while you can explore plenty of sexual fantasies with all the characters, you can also decide not to, as every adult sexual scene is optional.



IMMERSIVE SCENES
With over 200 songs, The Entrepreneur has been made in a way that songs change from scene to scene. On top of that, many scenes have been made with a particular attention to the background action, with hilarious events happening, resulting in a total immersion, just like a movie. Can you spot them all?



YOUR CHOICES MATTER
The Entrepreneur gives access to 4 different endings, each with 3 different twist. You can play and replay the game to get them all, discover scenes you've never seen in your last playthrough.
What are you waiting for? Become The Entrepreneur!
